about_the_game:
Odds and Ends, Volume 13


With Monster Grin's Odds & Ends token packs, it might sometimes be random, but it's always gonna be awesome! Take these 220 unique, artfully designed and stunning tokens by artist Axer Veicht for instance: awesome and detailed figures from across genre and time! If you're looking to add some variation to your game or to your party, be sure and pick up these tokens, which include anthropomorphic creatures in modern dress and style: hard-as-nails rhino toughs, grim-faced raccoon enforcers, German Shepherd soldiers and much more!

Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, black, silver, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of what's what and who's who. Also, with Monster Grin's new Altered States tokens, you can get maximum value from each and every token in this pack and really add that special something to your game!

This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver, as well as ethereal, invisible, stone-skinned, sand-skinned, and altered state versions):

  • Male Anthro Dog Soldier
  • Male Anthro Dog Thug
  • Female Anthro Fox Tough
  • Male Anthro Leopard Hipster
  • Male Anthro Lion Jock
  • Male Anthro Panda Student
  • Male Anthro Rabbit Activist
  • Female Anthro Raccoon Investigator
  • Male Anthro Rhino Tough
  • Male Anthro Squirrel Officer

Converted by: James Holloway

Released on January 29, 2019. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.3.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
